citations.narrative:
No contingency plan or documentation of review or training was available at the time of inspection. The written
contingency plan ensures that instructions for personnel are available and that animal welfare is maintained during an
emergency event. The facility must ensure that the contingency plan is available for review, and that staff are trained on
the plan.
Correct by April 28, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
No contingency plan or documentation of review or training was available at the time of inspection.  The written 
contingency plan ensures that instructions for personnel are available and that animal welfare is maintained during an 
emergency event.  The facility must ensure that the contingency plan is available for review, and that staff are trained on 
the plan.   
Correct by April 28, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End Section
